page.title: 13 The Leisure Centre
page.content: Today,people enjoy more leisure time than any previous generation.This has resulted in a great extension of leisure facilities.Monmouth Leisure Centre enjoys dual use of facilities with the Comprehensive School. Courses are designed to cater for the educational and leisure interests of the whole community,young and old,male and female.The variety of courses is considerable with examination courses such as typing,economics and English. Other activities include computers, painting and numerous indoor and outdoor sports.On site is a swimming pool with courses from beginners to advanced.The all weather pitch attracts people from a wide area including a hockey team from 12 miles away.A gymnasium is available,but the provision of a large indoor sports hall is a longed for development.
